entry.title: $2400 // BEAUTIFUL 1 BD + DEN APT WITH WASHER/DRYER NEAR CENTRAL PARK WEST
entry.content:
Gorgeous renovated one bedroom with a den (can be easily converted into 2 bedroom, but second bedroom wont have window), located steps away from COLUMBIA UNIVERSITY, CENTRAL PARK WEST, and SUBWAY (CATHEDRAL PKWY/110 ST ON B, C LINE).
This beautiful apartment features:
In-unit washer dryer
Jacuzzi spa bath
Dishwasher
Good closet space
Wooden Floor
High Ceilings
Exposed brick wall in one of the bedrooms
Easy walk-up - 2nd floor
Quiet
Video-intercom
2 AC units
Heat and water included in rent.

Can be rented furnished

No security deposit is required with Rhino insurance. International students are welcome!
To see this and other apartments in the neighborhood, please email Inna at show contact info

entry.title: $2000 // UWS Furnished Studio, NO FEE, Renovated
entry.content: UWS Furnished Studio: Townhouse studio with private street entrance - Limited Kitchen, Great inexpensive studio. One Block to #1 subway line & crosstown bus at 79th Street. Convenient to shopping, theater and parks and restaurants, Lincoln center, Museum of Natural History. Flexible lease terms, 3 month minimum. NO Fees, by Owner. Pets allowed on a case by case basis. Available January 1st.

entry.title: $2625 // HIGH END 1ROOMS/1bath/NOFEE/CENTRAL PARK WEST RENOVATED/GYM
entry.content: Stunning and spacious North facing studio with fully renovated separate eat-in kitchen, stainless steel appliances and dishwasher, sunny and spacious living area with private balcony. The property includes three buildings, connected through a glass-enclosed walkway, landscaped courtyard, fitness center and children's playground. Just one block from Central Park, enjoy luscious green spaces with the convenience of being just steps from the 1,2,3,B,C trains, Whole Foods, Trader Joe's, and much more. Full time doorman, live-in-super, and on site management create a community that is second to none!

entry.title: $2500 // 1 Bedroom W 107th between Broadway and Riverside. No Fee Near Columbia
entry.content: Beautiful 1 bedroom with wood floors, large windows, and exposed brick on the 4th floor of brownstone. Near Riverside Park and Columbia University.

entry.title: $1950 // *SUNNY 1 BR, DOORMAN, LAUNDRY, PETS OK!* off RIVERSIDE DR/W low 100's!
entry.content:
This is a sunny 1 bedroom apartment with windows facing south (very sunny!), 2 closets, high ceilings, large entrance foyer, beautiful hardwood floors, separate kitchen and views! The kitchen is small...otherwise this is a pretty amazing 1 bedroom for the price! This is a 24 hr doorman building with laundry room. Pets are welcome! A must see!
Fabulous location! Just steps to Riverside Park, all transportation, shopping, restaurants, cafes and nightlife. Near Garden of Eden, Westside Market, Smoke Jazz Club and a 5 minute walk to Columbia University! Please email or call/text Ruth at 917-592-3145 to schedule an appointment. You will love this beautiful, prewar building and friendly staff! Available January 1st.
